website_summaries.verdict: More of a summer weight pajama set, but features a button fly design that is hard to find. We recommend ordering a larger size than usual for the best fit.
pros: Secure button closures on pants, shirt, and collar
cons: Material is very lightweight, described by some as flimsy
Sizes often run very short, and not easy to match top and bottom
Fabric can feel coarse and abrasive

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I apologize for the delay in posting this. I finally got around to opening the pajamas yesterday and wearing them for the first time. Here's my take. I'm tall and very thin (thanks chemotherapy) so I'm kind of hard to fit. I was expecting the waist band to be a little large. Instead it fits wonderfully. It doesn't ride down my thin frame. They are comfortable and having a pocket to put my glasses in is nice. If the company has other styles I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Remington Steele

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size chart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these using RK's own size chart. I have a 36" waist exactly, so I bought these in Large. The pants are much too tight. I can't wear them. Large has to be for someone with a 32" waist. I bought another RK pair in XL which is supposed to fit someone with a 40 to 42 inch waist. They fit perfectly for a 36" waist. I wasted $50. because I bought 2 pair, washed them in cold water as instructed, before I wore them. Once they're washed, they cannot be returned.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleHeartLane

customer_reviews.title: superb
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality! I liked the first pair so much that I Bought a second pair in a darker blue, tailoring is exceptionally good + is full cut + fits to size, nice long hems that help sleeves + bottoms hang nice, large easy to use buttons + button fly, I can't say enough good things about the quality of these pajamas + the price is exceptionally low, although made in China they will exceed anyone's expectations, 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: BobG

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely finished set of pajamas for my husband. Had to hem both arms and legs but knew that going in as he is very short. Very soft fabric after a wash- not too wrinkled out of the dryer with zero shrinkage after washing and drying.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn K. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: There were what I wanted in material and fit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 8", but somewhat too heavy at 170 lbs. I debated between medium and large. Large sizes often have sleeves and legs that are too long. I didn't want pjs to fit too tightly, so I ordered the large and it works fine for me. (If it were a shirt, it might be too large). The pj's are comfortable and very light (what I wanted). They button easily. The waist is typical elastic with two top buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Clark

customer_reviews.title: Thin, Perfect stitching, classic pj's
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I wanted to get matching pj's and take cheesy Xmas pictures, but didn't want to spend a ton so we went with these, he got the large and I got the medium. They do have the weird boxer butt thing, ( I don't understand the concept of this) so I don't like the pants as much, but they fit my man perfectly, and I think we nailed our cheesy pics.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McGee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Classic Men's Pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: For many years, I've worn "sleep pants" and a t-shirt to bed. But I decided I would try REAL pajamas to see if they were as comfortable. Because I have a flair for the retro, I decided on these because they are the classic men's pajamas I've always seen. I washed them before I wore them (of course) and I can say for a certainly that these are very comfortable night clothes! They fit perfectly, came out of the dryer soft and looking great, and felt great on! I am very happy with these and will definitely buy them again. Maybe in another color for variety.
customer_reviews.author: C. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Very nice PJ's,  soft as advertised, and fit is good
customer_reviews.text: Buttons are larger than I normally see, and button holes are a bit small relative to the buttons, but I am learning how to get it to work. They appear to be of better fabric than some other brands I own, will review them in a few months after a couple of times through the washer. Oh, nice looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey D Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest possible quality - guaranteed disposable
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas look nice although they run a bit on the "short" side for a Long. However, they are made so cheaply, they look like they'll fall apart after the first washing. They are the cheapest possible weight and quality -- the elastic in the waist already feels like it is giving out and I just got them. The fabric around the buttons at the waist is already unthreading. The buttons that hold the pants together at the waist look like they are falling off -- there's thread coming off. I wouldn't recommend these pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Bill F.

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a trip to Taiwan
customer_reviews.text: The grid and color is just what I need. I used to buy pajama whenever I paid a visit back to my home country Taiwan which is a kingdom of apparels. Now with the internet so convenient and fast, I can search around the size, the looks and comparing the prices. Therefore, I have changed my shopping habit. This pajama is excellent in fabric quality and looks and not more expensive than in Taiwan, besides it save me the cost of airline ticket.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite PJs
customer_reviews.text: Finally, the perfect cotton pajamas. These are beautifully made, fit perfectly, feel great against my skin, and give me a lovely night’s rest. I’ve been wearing them every night because they quickly became my favorite pajamas. By the way, I love men’s pajamas because I am a 125-pound, 5‘10“ woman with very long legs and women’s pajamas are always too short. I bought the men’s medium and they fit perfectly. No shrinkage and virtually no wrinkling in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: The Tall size is actually shorter than regulars we own.
customer_reviews.text: I purposefully selected this particular pair of pajamas because it supposedly comes in Tall size. Well... the (Medium) Tall sized pajama that came is shorter than any of the regular (Medium) sized pajamas we have. The quality is fine/average. The fabric is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tornato Seven

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pajama Set
customer_reviews.text: I received this Pajama set as a gift a few years ago and they have held up well! The fabric is thin and light, perfect for a summer night, and is still in good shape despite repetitive/routing washing over the past couple years. My only complaints are 1. there are no pockets in the pants, only one on left breast and 2. it has shrunk a little over the repeat trips through the dryer. Overall the set if very appealing and comfortable and I still love to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: K.P. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: sewing needed for the pajamas.
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas fit so well that I sent for another pair. However I wish that companies would make pajamas with different lengths like denims do. My husband always has to have a seamstress sew the pant leg up to fit him. This happens to all the pj's I have bought for him. (I don't sew well). Otherwise, he has no problems with the pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Butch

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable night wear
customer_reviews.text: I echo the comments of many other reviewers. These PJs are awesome. Light weight but does keep the draft away. It's very comfortable to wear. You can feel the quality when wearing it. It has two buttons on the pants, so you can get a tighter fit. Three buttons on the shirt make it a quick procedure for putting on. Sleeping in them is also very comfortable, I don't feel restricted and I can move around with ease. It's also a has a classic look which makes for a good feel.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Great Fit for Stocky Guy
customer_reviews.text: I love these...actually bought a second pair. Along with being comfortable, I was surprised at how well they fit. I'm a stockier guy, so I usually need to buy garments that fit my body but need to be taken in (especially with pants). But these were perfect right away!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Buying pajamas the right size has frequently been a problem for me. I debated about whether to buy a large or extra large; I ended up getting an extra large. They were a bit too large but during washing they shrunk a little, so am happy with the results - still quite roomy but very comfortable. I would recommend these pajamas to others.
customer_reviews.author: Retiree

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable pajamas
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! I bought him a XXL as he wears a 42-44 pants and they fit nice, he said theyre comfortable, not heavy and they wash nicely in cool water, low heat dryer. No shrinkage and get softer when washed. He's 5'10 with 30" inseam and the length is just a tiny bit too long. All in all, a good value, well made pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: JanisW

customer_reviews.title: Lasting 2years so far.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only pjs that my elderly father can use. The ‘bubble butt’ is roomy and comfortable. My father can not tolerate the elastics so I undo everything (it is a chain stitch so not too hard), remove the elastic, then sew it back with a drawstring. This is his 4th pair. They are all holding up well. My father likes to have spares.
customer_reviews.author: YB

customer_reviews.title: but these...you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: i got these for my girlfriend in size medium. this is the second pair i have hot for her. she’s 5’2” and an athletic stocky build. she LOVES them. they’re loose but fit her comfortably. i would say they run a bit big but true to size. they wash well, don’t shrink and come out of the dryer almost wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup Catering

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find good quality in a simple item, like PJ's, these days. I sort of like these PJ's, but the one pair I purchased is a little smaller than desired. The material the PJ's are made from also doesn't seem really durable, but hasn't failed as yet. I've worn the PJ's at times over since I purchased them at least six months ago, but they aren't my first choice from the drawer. In the future I think I'll reorder, and try one size bigger, since I would like to like these PJ's since they are reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff SwitzerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: The material is very soft and comfortable. I had to buy XXL (mainly to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my father who lives in a nursing home. He loves them! The material is very soft and comfortable. I had to buy XXL (mainly to fit around his mid-section) and they fit him very well. The pant legs are a little long, but he rolls them up and they are fine. The waist band is elastic, and there is plenty of room and it does not dig in. We are very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Cappy

customer_reviews.title: great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Very good deal. Comfortable and light so especially good for hot climate. Good quality. Four years later still going strong. Am getting a couple more. Medium size fits me at 5'8" and medium build.
customer_reviews.author: Joe the Prof

customer_reviews.title: Description and Picture Didn’t Match
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good, but the written description (solid blue) was different from the corresponding picture (plaid). (Incidentally, the version described as plaid had a picture with a solid blue color). I ordered according to the blue written description but got the plaid in the picture. The confusing discrepancy is the only reason I did not give five stars. Disappointing, but not worth the trouble to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Bit Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Overall this pair of men’s pajamas is inferior; the fabric, the construction the size were all a big disappointment. I ordered a large tall and they were anything but tall. The button on the shirt fell off during the first washing. I would have sent them back but at the time they were really needed. The price was reasonable but that should have been a red flag — you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Washed and worn one time and developed a hole in the seam (see picture). Cheap quality, I’m very disappointed. Bought these for my dad that I’m taking care of and I don’t have the original tags so I can’t return them. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great for Summer Wear
customer_reviews.text: Finally some warm to hot temperatures have arrived! These jammies are great in summer weather, so light and cool against the skin. My wife thinks they look good, even sexy, on me. I like them too. One thing though is that the waistband is a little scratchy against my sensitive skin. They’ve been in only one wash, so perhaps the scratchiness will ease off after a couple of washings.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonham

customer_reviews.title: Tight elastic waist
customer_reviews.text: The PJs are decently made, but I found them both too large and too small. The pants and sleeves had to be altered for me, but I'm a bit on the short side and that's pretty normal. The bigger problem is the waist. The elastic is strong and I'd be happier if there was a bit more room. I figure that this could improve over time. It's not so bad as to be unwearable, but it could be better. My waist is 32, if that helps. I'm sure that a larger size would have been much too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: bob23

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product
customer_reviews.text: The RK Classical Sleepwear Men’s Broadcloth Woven Pajama Set is extremely well-made. It keeps its shape when laundered. The fit is ample and not tight. This is the second pair I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Arms a little short
customer_reviews.text: The reason I am rating these pajamas 4 stars is that the pajama arms were a tad short but my husband did not mind keeping them because they fit fine otherwise. He is 6'4" and the legs were long enough. The arms of other shirts or pajamas that are 2XTall have always been a little longer.. Husband does likenthem so ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: dancerlady

customer_reviews.title: Fit as stated
customer_reviews.text: Color. Gift for my dad. Just what he was looking for. He liked the big buttons on front as her is 90 and the really small buttons are harder for him to manage.
customer_reviews.author: wz

customer_reviews.title: He has been using the product for a few weeks now and everything seems to be just fine. I would recommend this product to anybod
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my Uncle, who is in a nursing home. After opening the packaging, I can tell the product seems to be well made. He has been using the product for a few weeks now and everything seems to be just fine. I would recommend this product to anybody who needs both top and bottom sleepwear. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Sleepwear!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very happy with these pajamas. It is almost impossible to find a button fly front at a retail location. The pajamas are a high quality cotton. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelia1

customer_reviews.title: some concerns
customer_reviews.text: I found that the product was of good quality, fit and finish. However the button at the waste is not what I expected. All of my other Pajamas have a snap. Also the button holes are horizontal rather than vertical as all of my other clothes are. Other than that I am pleased with the product/
customer_reviews.author: Robert Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good-Looking Stylish Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely satisfied with the appearance, fit and wear of these pajamas. The quality is first-rate, and I can't see anything wrong with these pajamas at this point. (I'll update regarding the wear in a few months). And yes, I plan to order again from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: JMJr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Good-looking Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas worked well for me. I am 6' 3" and 190 lbs, and I ordered an XL Tall. The fit was perfect - roomy but not overly big. The fabric is not heavy, which makes them more comfortable for warm weather. C0lor choice is somewhat limited in tall sizes, and the cobalt plaid I ordered is a bit bold, but overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. McBride

customer_reviews.title: Good size options for these traditional light weigh pajamas.
customer_reviews.text: Liked that I could order tall size. I have long arms and torso, so regular sizes are problematic for me in this style of pajamas. They seem to be well made. Bought a pair last year, and felt confident in getting another pair this year.
customer_reviews.author: W. J.

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are very handsome and well made. My husband was a resident in a rehabilitation facility and we wanted him to look good while doctors and nurses were entering his room. These RK Classical Sleepwear p.j.'s were just what we were looking for. Of course he will continue to wear them at home and feel good wearing them here too.
customer_reviews.author: doka

customer_reviews.title: Best PJs ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: My invalid elderly husband lives in these PJs The fit is good with a very long fly opening which is very helpful. They have a button at the shirt top for closing at the neck when desired. The bottoms have two rear seams which make for a more comfortable fit. They are just great. Best we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: bernice leach

customer_reviews.title: Short size....short shipped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered TWO pair of similar PJs Only one was shipped. [So far] I ordered TALL size. These are no different in length to similar large. My wife says current fashion is to cut everything I think the fashion makes young men look like 40 lbs of simpleton sausages in 50 lb bags. Fully expect this pair to shrink in the first wash and go into the bin...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Castrovinci

customer_reviews.title: Fine product with one small fault
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product now that I have cut off the label. The size label attached to the brand tag had a rough plastic like feeling that irritated my neck. An otherwise fine product was degraded by a small assembly shortcoming. All of the tags should have been soft cotton with no melted edges.
customer_reviews.author: Applegate Don

customer_reviews.title: Love the pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas! They fit well, they're comfortable, and they look nice! I may never go back to wearing a t-shirt and gym shorts to sleep! I have worn them every day for the past month and washed them once or twice a week. They are still holding up very well. I plan to buy more in different designs and colors. They are so reasonably priced! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Collin Wiener

customer_reviews.title: True comfort that does not wrinkle
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who is leaving for college this fall. He will be living in the dorms & wanted to have a true set of pajamas. He loves these! They are comfortable, cool, they don't wrinkle & the material is perfect for pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: heather salas

customer_reviews.title: Smart looking, well-fitting, comfortable sleepwear.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this sleepwear. Perfect lightweight fabric for the hot NYC summer weather. Bought 2 pairs last summer for my 95 year-old Dad. They washed so well - no shrinkage, colors still vibrant - that I bought 3 more pairs this summer. They fit him well and he’s very comfortable in them. The pants are much easier for him to use than those with the drawstring, and he loves having the breast pocket on his shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Carole M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. Too  Loose fitting for me. Good quality and nice feel.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for good price. I am 6.0 190. I wear 42 jacket 36 pants. I ordered a large and it was too big. I didn't want to have them wrap up while I sleep. If you want them loose fitting, order true to size. Returned for a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Ordered XL tall to begin with, but too short in arms. So returned for XXL tall. These are perfect. MY husband likes them roomy. They have the roomy seat which we searched for years for. He is 6'4" and slender
customer_reviews.author: joce

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD QUALITY PAJAMAS!!
customer_reviews.text: It was so nice to order these p'j's through the mail, instead of going from store to store trying to find a nice two piece set of pajamas. My husband is very pleased with these well made p.j's.. They wash beautifully! We are both very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kay

customer_reviews.title: The length is perfect and the tops are roomy enough for comfort
customer_reviews.text: First we ordered size Large which proved to be too large, so we returned these. When the Medium size PJ's arrived we were surprised to find that the length of the pants made them into Capri's and the tops were much too small for comfort. We had no choice but to return these also. At this point we gave up on this product and have since purchased PJ's locally at JC Penney (store brand) in Medium. The length is perfect and the tops are roomy enough for comfort. I can't recommend this product unless you are sure you are big enough in body for a large size.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, looks good, thin fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I took one star off for how thin the fabric is. These are strictly for Summer wear, I live in a hot climate so that's 3 seasons of the year :) Aside from the material being very thin, these are made from fine fabric, like a light, cool bed sheet, and look and feel great. The manufacturing quality is good and they are tailored correctly and fit perfect to size. I normally try for natural fabrics but I recommend these. :) They are like the childhood pajamas you remember, just thin. Great fit!
customer_reviews.author: soda

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Product
customer_reviews.text: I was completely satisfied with this product. The material is both a nice summer weight and washes beautifully. Is a handsome color blue plaid material that most men would be happy to wear. Very nice product at a believable price and a gift I was proud to give and was told they "fit perfectly".
customer_reviews.author: Old Santa Lover

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves his new pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these pajamas-they fit him well & the sleeves are long enough. The material is comfortable. The quality is excellent & the finishing details on the collar are very nice. These were such a hit that I got him a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for sometime for PJ's that are better made and these are a lot better than what II have been wearing. They are sewed much more securely. Unlike most of the ones I've had recently they are not so tight that they restrict movement ,.( which ultimately causes tears) I move a lot when I sleep. I believe they should last a lot longer time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Shine

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice and fits me perfectly. The large size (which I bought) is made for someone who used to wear medium and gained some weight, rather than tall people. This suits me fine, but I noticed that other reviewers complained that the sleeves are too short. They should make these pajamas with an option for leg/sleeve length, like they do for shirts The reason I docked it one star is that the horizontal buttonholes are non-standard and annoying at first, but I got used to them after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: orenr

customer_reviews.title: The style was nice and well made and because I really want one ...
customer_reviews.text: The material didn't feel very high quality compared to the price. It was way too big, especially the shirt. The style was nice and well made and because I really want one set for my father, I had to order smaller size for him. I will return the 3X size.
customer_reviews.author: Fatemeh

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly and Comfortable to Wear
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these PJs for my husband a few years ago. The pant leg is not too short which he likes. The PJs fit him perfectly and they are comfortable to wear. That is why I ordered another pair for him.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria T.

customer_reviews.title: Just what my dad wanted.
customer_reviews.text: My dad had lost some weight so need new pjs in a smaller size. He'd liked his previous pair of these and was delighted to have new ones that fit .
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Stoneburner

customer_reviews.title: Elderly father loves these pajamas
customer_reviews.text: My father asked for pajamas for Father's Day so I chose these based on the ratings. He is over 94 and wears an Extra Large and told me that he likes them very much. He said the blue is beautiful and they are the right weight for him in South Carolina. He has not washed them yet as,they are brand new but based on the good reviews I hope they wash well. I thought the price was good for the apparent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pajamas for my father-in-law and he loves them (and he is very picky). He is a large man and it's hard to find pajamas that fit, so this brand has larger sizes and a nice variety of patterns. My father-in-law says they're very comfortable. Will definitely be buying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my order!
customer_reviews.text: I meant to order the flannel pajamas for my husband, but ordered these by mistake (in addition to one pair of flannels). I was going to return the broadcloth woven pajamas, but my husband wanted to keep them. He said he can wear them in the Spring. These pajamas (and the RK Claasical Sleepwear flannel pajamas) fit him perfectly. He is very pleased with his Christmas gift! Shipping was efficient and problem-free. I had an overall wonderful experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly Classic Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the classic design and quality of these pajamas. The dark blue piping on the collar , cuffs, and button up borders is a super nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: J Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Functional but low quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, and easier to put on once you realize you don't actually have to unbutton it when taking it off. Unfortunately, cheaply made and with extremely poor stitching. No pockets on the pants.
customer_reviews.author: kbuck

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable cloth
customer_reviews.text: My elderly dad does not like these, they are uncomfortable and scratchy, washed them numerous times. We have bought this product, made in China, other places. We cannot find pajamas made in the US, which would hopefully have a better quality of cloth to be softer and less irritating.
customer_reviews.author: vg

customer_reviews.title: PJs
customer_reviews.text: Colorful,good fit, priced right. Lot of loose thread when new. Ordered 2 sets- one had half of snap closureon bottoms mmissing. Had to return for exchange. Overall, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Soft material. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time. Quality very good. Product is exactly as described and shown. I gave this to my 16 year old son as a gift and he loves them and says they are very comfortable. He will wear on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: PJ's have a top button, great for colder nights :)) Soft material, yet retains a certain crisp look!
customer_reviews.author: I N

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric, light and airy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Nice and light for sleeping. These were used for as a costume for a play. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a women, not a man.
customer_reviews.text: This runs small, after one wash it was too small for my husband. I ordered an xlarge but it was not as expected. Also, it buttons on the wrong side, as a womens blouse, and there is not a fly in the pants. The color is very pretty, vivid, and the material is soft and cuddly to feel. Passed these on to our daughter and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: funtazmic

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the full cut of the pajama pants. Love the large button closure on top and pants.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy PJ's
customer_reviews.text: NIce to have a new set of PJ's. This set is much better than the flannel bottoms and t shirt I was wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: What's most important to know you ask?  I guess that would be the fact that I need to go on a diet .
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, just a little too small around the belly. That's more of my fault than yours.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Fits as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father; fits well with enough room to be comfortable in bed and wearing around the house. New stuff is a problem for him and I was pleased that he accepted these as a replacement for favorite pajamas that needed retirement.
customer_reviews.author: Van M

customer_reviews.title: Feel comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This pajamas fit well, are very comfortable and wash up well. I will buy them again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: From now on, the only PJs and robes I will buy. I really can't say enough good! Exceptional quality. The piping around collar and cufffs, etc. mean these hold their shape after washing. Piping at pocket strengthens so can safely tuck reading glasses or whatever in the pocket. I have been searching for such fine PJs and finally found them.
customer_reviews.author: PassTheOkra

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These pjs arrived on time and in perfect condition. Perfect timing. I had an accident and have been inside the house for the past 3 weeks and my daughter has been stopping in to help me so it is good that I have these pjs to wear around her. They fit about as I expected and are quite comfortable as well as very nice looking. I think they are a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Silver fox

customer_reviews.title: Just nice normal pajamas.
customer_reviews.text: Men's pj's seem to have become a fashion item. These are normal, non fussy pajamas. Some of the plaids are not restful looking. We went with a conservative plaid.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca P. Bakhaus

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for late in the summer season
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel good on the body after a wash. The material feels a bit course and it has polyester mixed in with cotton, which holds the heat. Not ideal for warm weather, but my husband tends to be cold frequently, so it apparently does not bother him. At least the polyester should keep the collar and the jacket front interfacing smooth.
customer_reviews.author: C. Van Hest

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much ordered a second pair!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pair and we can't me happier. Love how they look and feel. Washed the first pair a number or times and they still look as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Bumble Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great pajamas
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these pajamas, they are very comfortable to wear, great material and great colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: I don't love it because I don't wear them
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't love it because I don't wear them. My husband says they are comfortable. The fabric is a bit thin but this is common in men's broadcloth pjs today.

customer_reviews.title: light and breathable sleepware.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. No extraneous material that causes rubbing. Feels great against the skin.
customer_reviews.author: scifiguy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect summer PJs
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, lightweight good-quality summer pajamas. As received the lengths were very good for me (generally wear pants with 32" inseam and shirts with 35"-36" sleeves). The 'large' waist is also good (typical pants 36"-38"). After washing once, the lengths seem a little shorter, but are still OK/
customer_reviews.author: Bilbo

customer_reviews.title: XL tall men’s pajamas
customer_reviews.text: This sleepwear is comfortable and light weight. Even in the tall size, the sleeves were too short. For me, the pants were too long.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I'm 6'2, and the measurements of the Medium Tall ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2, and the measurements of the Medium Tall should have fit me perfectly. Instead, after one turn through the laundry (on gentle settings), the outfit had shrunk enough to perfectly fit my little brother, who is 5'3.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan G. Tanafon

customer_reviews.title: These pajamas are true to size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pajamas for my husband. They arrived in a short time and fit according to size. They are also comfortable and nice looking. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Well made comfortable PJs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who likes roomy PJ bottoms. Likes them!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu43

customer_reviews.title: Long sleeve cotton pajamas
customer_reviews.text: They washed well and my husband is comfortable in these pajamas,

customer_reviews.text: Product poorly described by Amazon-Should include arm length, leg length and GSM of fabric.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not Great.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pjs!
customer_reviews.text: The pjs are for my husband. They are well made. Thanks so much

customer_reviews.text: I have looked for some time for something like this, had one almost exactly like it 60 years ago and liked it then and do now. Not fancy but very serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. P

customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets of Long sleeve pajamas. On one, a top was missing a button. On another, the pant leg ripped on the left inseam, apparently as a result of being poorly stitched. Otherwise, fabric comfortable, and proper fit for XLT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great - Dad is happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad when my mom was complaining about having to go out to the store to shop for more PJ's for my dad. He really likes them and my mom is delighted because they turned out to be the perfect length... don't need hemming! I will likely purchase another pair soon in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Best PJs available on the market since JC Penny's dropped ...
customer_reviews.text: Best PJs available on the market since JC Penny's dropped their original line years ago for the crap they sell now. They fit to size and wash perfectly. After I purchased my first set to try, I then bought 7 more pair of different colors. They all perform like expected. PSM
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: Dad likes his New PJs
customer_reviews.text: As I did not buy these for myself, but my father I can only give 4 stars because my father has Alzheimer's and his language skills are limited. He says he likes them and wears them. I loved the quick delivery and they were a good price. they seem well made. My Dad received them on his 90th birthday. If they wear well, we will order another pair for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: tara catt

customer_reviews.title: They also packaged them in a very nice box, with a personalized note that indicated that ...
customer_reviews.text: These turned up and greatly exceeded expectations. The pattern and colors were sophisticated, and the fabric is high quality. They also packaged them in a very nice box, with a personalized note that indicated that these were coming from a small firm in the US that cares about customer satisfaction. I have immediately ordered more of the same.
customer_reviews.author: David Skok
